news: [Thanks to GitHub contributors] Anyone can contribute, do code reviews, improve documentation and create pull request. Share you contribution and add a Star to GitHub at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
[Contribute to the wiki] Open a pull request to improve documentation at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki
[News] Automatic report is restored in v0.98, translate menus and buttons and open issues to GitHub directly from jSQL menu
[Test reports] Auto-generated reports are now published in the wiki, review reports and Maven site at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki/Programming-jSQL
